item.title: How to Rotate GCP Service Account Keys with GitHub Actions
item.description: In this blog post, we’ll cover how to automate the rotation of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) service account keys using GitHub Actions. Regularly rotating service account keys is a security best practice to help mitigate the risk of unauthorized access. Prerequisites Before we start, ensure that you have the following set up: A GCP project with a service account and key. A GitHub account and a GitHub repository. The Google Cloud SDK (gcloud) installed and configured.
